channel.title: General on tek256
channel.description: Recent content in General on tek256

item.title: Workflow Optimization
item.description: The last month or so has been a lot about workflow optimization for me. I’ve sort of made it an unscheduled tradition to go thru every few months and look at what fat I can trim out of my processes. The last month most of the “optimization” if you will, has been regarding my actual programming work and the things I’m working on. Currently I’m undergoing a pretty large refactor of Astera in order to make it a good bit more versatile.

item.title: Game Jam
item.description: Hey, Since I didn’t take part in Ludum Dare 46 (I really didn’t enjoy the theme) I figure I still should do a jam of some sort. Now there’s plenty I could simply take part in and probably do decently well in. But I’m a bit old fashioned and don’t want to use Unity or Game Maker. I’ve starting pulling a few things together and figured I could host my own game jam.

item.title: life changes
item.description: I’m gonna go ahead and preface this with I’m not looking for pity or any hand outs. A few days ago I had a pretty negative life event happen. I’m still breathing and as healthy as I really can be. But my living situation & safety net got pulled out from under me. As a result, I’m lowering the time I allocate for my personal projects in order to look for work / contracts in the meantime to try and build up a safety net.

item.title: my bucket list
item.description: One day I’m going to die. This is a universal truth for each and every one of us. The last few weeks before writing this have been rough for me. That’s why I’m writing this, as a message to my future self to recognize where I was and where I’ve gotten to. I encourage everyone to write a bucket list of their own. Here are the current goals of mine, I won’t remove any, but I will add some if I start to run low.
